meanings.definition: Branching like a tree or shrub.
meanings.sent1: The ramose plant spread its branches wide in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The tree had a ramose growth pattern, with branches reaching in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The ramose bush looked like a mini forest in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts branched out in a ramose manner, exploring various possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The ramose silhouette of the tree against the sunset was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.sent1: The ramose coral reef provided shelter for many sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: The ramose structure of the antlers made the deer look majestic.
meanings.sent3: The ramose pattern on the wallpaper gave the room a natural feel.
meanings.sent4: The ramose network of roads in the city made navigation confusing.
meanings.sent5: The ramose design of the chandelier added an elegant touch to the room.

meanings.definition: Resembling a branch in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The ramose pattern on the fabric looked like intertwining branches.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a ramose pattern on the canvas, mimicking nature.
meanings.sent3: The ramose cracks on the wall seemed to form a secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a ramose quality, flowing in natural waves.
meanings.sent5: The ramose veins on the leaf created a beautiful intricate design.
